This is a testharness.js-based test.
[FAIL] Using the ~rid SDP syntax in a remote offer does not control the local encodings active flag
  assert_not_equals: got disallowed value false
[FAIL] Disabling encodings locally does not change the SDP
  assert_not_equals: Could not find simulcast attribute. got disallowed value undefined
Harness: the test ran to completion.
